title: Biodesulfurization enhancement
authors: Martzoukou O, Klenias F, Kopsini E, Hatzinikolaou DG
abstract: Biodesulfurization (BDS) has emerged as an alternative to the excessively costly hydrodesulfurization of recalcitrant heterocyclic sulfur compounds, such as dibenzothiophene (DBT) and its derivatives. The model desulfurizing strain
